data.comment: The match has started.
Free kick Santos.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Santos in the half of Recife PE.
Santos drive upfield and Marinho gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Recife PE defender.
An attacking Santos player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 7, Marinho smashes in a penalty at Urbano Caldeira. The score is now 1-0.
Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Santos.
Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 10, Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Santos.
Goal! Lucas Braga extends Santos's lead to 2-0.
In the minute 11, Great play from Lucas Verissimo to set up the goal.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Recife PE.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
In the minute 14, Can Santos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
In Santos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Recife PE's Adryelson has been booked in Santos.
In the minute 15, Lucas Lourenco is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Santos's Marinho breaks free at Urbano Caldeira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Recife PE have a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Santos in their own half.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Throw-in for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
In the minute 17, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Santos.
Corner awarded to Santos.
In the minute 19, At Urbano Caldeira, Lucas Lourenco has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Santos's Lucas Lourenco is back in action after a slight knock.
In Santos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 20, Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Santos a goal kick.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Marquinhos (Recife PE) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
In the minute 22, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Recife PE throw-in in Santos's half.
Goal kick for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
Recife PE have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 24, Santos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Santos will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Recife PE.
In the minute 26, Santos's Jobson has been booked in Santos and will miss the next match through suspension.
Important block from the Santos defence as Junior Tavares fires in a strike for Recife PE.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 28, Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
Recife PE to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
Marquinhos strikes to reduce the deficit to 2-1 at Urbano Caldeira.
In the minute 28, Patric with an assist there.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Santos.
In the minute 32, Santos are in shooting range from this free kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Santos.
Free kick Recife PE.
In the minute 34, Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Santos in the half of Recife PE.
Recife PE pushes forward through Leandro Barcia, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 35, Throw-in Santos.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Recife PE.
In the minute 39, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Lucas Mugni (Recife PE) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 42, Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Recife PE capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Lucas Verissimo for Santos has been booked by Wilton Pereira Sampaio and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 44, Recife PE push forward at Urbano Caldeira and Patric gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Santos defence.
Santos to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Santos close to the penalty box.
At Urbano Caldeira the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Santos's Marinho is on target but unsuccessful.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Recife PE throw-in in Santos's half.
In the minute 45, Wilton Pereira Sampaio blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Goal! Recife PE draw level to 2-2 through a Leandro Barcia header.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Cuca (Santos) is making a first substitution, with Sandry Roberto replacing Jobson.
In the minute 46, The home team have replaced Lucas Lourenco with Yeferson Soteldo. This is the second substitution made today by Cuca.
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Ricardinho (Recife PE) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 48, Free kick in a good position for Santos!
Yeferson Soteldo for Santos gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Recife PE have a goal kick.
In the minute 50, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio waits before resuming play because Junior Tavares for Recife PE is still down.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a throw-in for Recife PE, close to Santos's area.
In the minute 52, Junior Tavares is back on his feet again.
Felipe Jonatan (Santos) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Marinho is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
Marinho returns to the field for Santos after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in high up the field for Santos in Santos.
In the minute 57, Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
Attention is being given to Santos’s Felipe Jonatan and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Santos's Felipe Jonatan looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 62, It's a goal kick for the away team in Santos.
Mikael is replacing Lucas Mugni for the away team.
Throw-in for Santos in the half of Recife PE.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 63, Santos's Para misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Recife PE close to the penalty box.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, In Santos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The home team replace Kaio Jorge with Bruno Marques.
In Santos Santos attack through Marinho. The finish is off target, however.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Recife PE a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Throw-in Santos.
Santos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 69, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
Throw-in Santos.
In the minute 70, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Bruno Marques scores with a header and the home team now lead 3-2.
Marinho instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 72, Santos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Santos to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Santos just outside Recife PE's area.
In the minute 74, Santos's Yeferson Soteldo gets in a shot on goal at Urbano Caldeira. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Diego Pituca (Santos) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 76, Goal kick for Recife PE at Urbano Caldeira.
Junior Tavares (Recife PE) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
In the minute 77, Free kick Recife PE.
Goal kick for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Felipe Jonatan.
In the minute 79, Wagner Leonardo (Santos) has replaced the possibly injured Felipe Jonatan at Urbano Caldeira.
Jair Ventura is making the team's second substitution at Urbano Caldeira with Maxwell replacing Marquinhos.
Jonathan Gomez is on a sub for Adryelson for Recife PE.
In the minute 80, Santos have been given a penalty...
Recife PE make their fourth substitution with Ronaldo replacing Marcio Araujo.
Santos have extended their lead to 4-2 courtesy of a Yeferson Soteldo penalty.
In the minute 83, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Recife PE.
Madson is replacing Lucas Braga for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 88, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Recife PE's Jonathan Gomez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Santos have a goal kick.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Santos drive forward but Yeferson Soteldo is judged offside.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 4-2.
Bruninho is replacing Ricardinho for the away team.
